resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Atrapa los casos de la segunda declinación griega</string>
            <string language="en">Find the case in the Greek second declension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie den Fall in der griechischen zweiten 
Deklination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez le cas dans la deuxième déclinaison 
grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre o caso no segundo declension grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi il caso nella seconda declinazione greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε την περίπτωση στην ελληνική δεύτερη κλίση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad consistente en hacer click sobre una palabra griega declinada de la segunda declinación para introducirla en el cuadro de su correspondiente caso, mediante otro click.</string>
            <string language="en">Activity in which the student has to click on a declined Greek word from the second declension and put it into the square corresponding to its case with another click.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">casos</string>
            <string language="en">cases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segunda declinación</string>
            <string language="en">second declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Aktivität, der Kursteilnehmer ein 
gesunkenes griechisches Wort von der zweiten Deklination an klicken 
und es in das Quadrat setzen muß, das seinem Fall mit einem anderen 
Klicken entspricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
cliquer sur un mot grec diminué de la deuxième déclinaison
et la mettre dans la place correspondant à son cas à un autre 
clic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade em que o estudante tem que estalar sobre
uma palavra grega declinada do segundo declension e a pôr no quadrado
que corresponde a seu caso com um outro clique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività in cui l'allievo deve scattare sopra una
parola greca ribassante dalla seconda declinazione e metterlo nel 
quadrato che corrisponde al relativo caso ad un altro scatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να 
χτυπήσει σε μια μειωμένη ελληνική λέξη από τη δεύτερη κλίση και
να το βάλει στην τετραγωνική αντιστοιχία στην περίπτωσή του με 
ένα άλλο στιγμιαίο πάτημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fälle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweites declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">deuxième declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">casos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segundo declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">casi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">secondo declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιπτώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεύτερο declencion</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
